replies.body: R.I.P Death fire grasp you were a essential part of every mages and AP assassins life. You now go to join the holy place of where all our beloved items go down in our memory's forever along with force of nature and golden heart. So i now say a sorrowful and painful goodbye DFG for all the ranked games you carried me through that little bit of DMG i was always missing and all the close matches with both nexuses exposed when you gave me the power to kill that Darius and win the game. R.I.P DFG you will gone but never forgotten. And im sorry to the black-torch but i have no personal experience with you but im sure plenty people of do so go now and take your place beside your brother in riot heaven. {{item:3188}} {{item:3128}} {{item:3151}}
That was one of the best  obituaries I have ever read.
He's with heart of gold now...
Blackfire torch + teemo butchered entire teams in Dominion ... Glad to see it's gone :D
R.I.P {{item:3128}} dun dunnnn We will remember you in riot heaven... dun dun YOU WILL BE REMEMBERED ICRIEVERYTIM {{item:2050}} {{item:3070}}

Logged in to upvote for the first time ever. RIP DFG

Do you really think Yasuo is a strong pick at this point? I personally feel he is easily dealt with and has a large number counter picks that don't require much effort. He seems like the type of champion that is hard engage do as much as you can dance around a bit and then die, unlike other assassins he has no reliable disengage or real way to survive a team fight and his lane phase is much more difficult than other melee assassins.
Still cut about them removing my force of nature.
Why are you guys doing another Kat and Nid skin? They already have tons.... Cant we get something like a Quinn skin?
Cause we all know {{champion:133}} is the most viable ADC in the game XD
I didn't know Top was spelt with 6 letters.

Katarina has 7 Skins, 3 of which are legacy and Warring Kingdoms Kata is also going to be Legacy Making 4 of her now 8 skins Unavailable all year round. With those gone your left with 4 Retextures/Remodels Exculding Sandstorms Limited Particles. Also Katarina is an older champions so obviously she is going to have more skins. Katarina got her latest skin (slaybell) on the christmas of 2013. It is now 2015 I've waited long enough for a good retexture and remodel that isnt skimpy, and has decent particles. So. Next time you comment on katarina or nidalee's skins think about the quality of the skins they have compared to the quality of all the newer champs skins such as Quinn.
The problem if ppl play these champs for too long is that Quinn, Zac, Aatrox, etc. will be left unoticed so I rather not think about quality but equality

So they remove DFG & dont buff & in a few cases NERF the champions that use it? Yea they say they will add new items for mages but right now the mage pool has been overall nerfed? PLZ riot

Less a nerf, more a power shift. Ahri, granted deals much less burst and probably won't blow people up nearly as much, but the move-speed burst to her Q makes her much stronger as a kite-mage, even while her ult is down. Fizz, conversely, loses a lot of his presence while chum the waters is down, but while it's available, he is much, much scarier. The 20% bonus damage for his follow-up spell rotation is very, very scary.

Not happy for Zyra {{champion:143}}  with DFG gone .... you already nerfed the cooldown from pods so the best way to get close to 40% was a DFG and Athene's. Now we'll have to buy another CD item. Please put Zyra's CD back to 20%
